Using Variations Audio Timeliner

The following video explains the basics of using Variations Audio Timeliner for annotating musical form on a recording. (I made this video before I got the hang of Vimeo. Both the embedded and the full-screen versions are hard to read. I recommend following the link below and watching—or downloading—from the main Vimeo page.)

Introduction to Variations Audio Timeliner from Kris Shaffer on Vimeo.
